languages.text: "Мне доложили, что Дом Орселлио в скором времени собирает Большой Совет. Не лучше ли дождаться его?"

traits.locale_text: "Мне доложили, что Дом Орселлио в скором времени собирает Большой Совет. Не лучше ли дождаться его?"

languages.text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"
languages.original_text: "Мне доложили, что Дом Орселлио в скором времени собирает Большой Совет. Не лучше ли дождаться его?"

traits.locale_text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to take place first?"

"I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家はまもなく大評議会を招集すると聞いている。まず、そちらが終わるのを待つ方がいいのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家はまもなく大評議会を招集すると聞いている。まず、そちらが終わるのを待つ方がいいのではないか？」

languages.text: “我听说奥赛罗家族马上要召开家族议会了，不如先等议会结束再说吧？”
languages.original_text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"

traits.locale_text: “我听说奥塞罗家族马上要召开家族议会了，不如先等议会结束再说吧？”

languages.text: « D'après mes informations, le grand conseil de la maison Orsellio doit bientôt avoir lieu. Ne vaudrait-il pas mieux attendre qu'il soit fini ? »
languages.original_text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"

traits.locale_text: « D'après mes informations, le grand conseil de la maison Orsellio doit bientôt avoir lieu. Ne vaudrait-il pas mieux attendre qu'il soit fini ? »

languages.text: «Tengo entendido que el gran consejo de la casa Orsellio está a punto de reunirse. ¿No sería mejor aguardar a su término?».
languages.original_text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"

traits.locale_text: «Tengo entendido que el gran consejo de la casa Orsellio está a punto de reunirse. ¿No sería mejor aguardar a su término?».

languages.text: "Ich wurde in Kenntnis gesetzt, dass das Haus Orsellio bald seinen Großen Rat einberuft. Sollten wir nicht lieber abwarten, bis er getagt hat?"
languages.original_text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde in Kenntnis gesetzt, dass das Haus Orsellio bald seinen Großen Rat einberuft. Sollten wir nicht lieber abwarten, bis er getagt hat?"

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin yakında Yüce Konseyini toplayacağını duydum. Önce o işin bitmesini beklesek daha iyi olmaz mı?"
languages.original_text: "I have been informed that House Orsellio will soon convene its Grand Council. Would it not be better to wait for it to finish first?"
